pages.title: Night Rogue
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:build/arsenal/transteam_gun)Transteam Gun$(/l) and $(l:build/devices/transteam_gun_night_rogue)Transteam Gun (Night Rogue)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance II$(li)Night Vision$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Strength II$(li)Flying
